Topic Summary: PCC - processing under customs control - Common Customs Tariff liability
Tax Legislation: Article 2(1), Chapter 3, Article 28, 29, Article 59(1), Article 84, 86, 87, 88, 89, 130-133, 189, 204, 239 of the Customs Code, Article 497, 502, 505, 506, 508,  Title III of the Implementing Regulation. Chapter 4 of the Implementing Regulation,Annex 67, February and September 2015 versions of the Respondent’s Instruction Manual on Processing under Customs Control Paragraph 2.3, and 3.4
